Generation V.Black: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
Generation V.White: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
Generation V.Black 2: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.
Generation V.White 2: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.

Generation VI.X: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
Generation VI.Y: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.

Generation VII.Sun: No matter how much time and money is spent raising it, its flowers are the most beautiful when they bloom in the wild.
Generation VII.Moon: As soon as it finds a male to be its partner, the beautiful flower on its head darkens, droops, and withers away.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: The fragrance of its flower differs slightly depending on the soil where it grew up. Sniffing the aroma calms your heart and mind.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It's well liked by other Pokémon because of its beauty. The flower on its head needs constant care, or it will soon wither and rot.

Generation VIII.Sword: It's believed that even first-rate gardeners have a hard time getting the flower on a Lilligant's head to bloom.
Generation VIII.Shield: Essential oils made from Lilligant flowers have a sublime scent, but they're also staggeringly expensive.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: I suspect that its well-developed legs are the result of a life spent on mountains covered in deep snow. The scent it exudes from its flower crown heartens those in proximity.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.
Generation IX.Violet: No matter how much time and money is spent raising it, its flowers are the most beautiful when they bloom in the wild.

Generation V.White: Pinwheel Forest (inner), Lostlorn Forest , Abundant Shrine ( rustling grass )
Generation V.White 2: Pinwheel Forest (inner), Lostlorn Forest , Castelia City , Abundant Shrine , Victory Road ( rustling grass )
